title: Worst support , won't continue with pixel
content:
Hi team, 

I wanted to order an accessory which is showing coming soon from last 2 years. https://store.google.com/product/usb_type_c_usb_type_c?hl=en-GB

I know I can somehow find a way out on forum to get email address for support but don't want to out so much efforts again. 
Country: India
Phone : pixel 2 xl

You guys come up with great phone, I love pixel 6 specs but, you know what I will not go for it and also won't recommend anyone though I love pixel 2 xl which I'm using from 3 years now. 

Bad support, no service center in india, any issue with phone then have to courier it to mumbai vendor who doesn't even have a spare phone as substitute for some time. 

Tell me one more simple thing, why the chat option been removed from ask Google ?
Attached is the screenshot, I need someone to answer how can end user go to contact option if all the options are just links and not relevant topic ?

Take this to executive level pls.
